page.title: 04Josie's Day 2
page.content: Now it is time to take the children to the school bus,up to the farm gate.Time for housework - tidy up, fire to get ready, dishes to wash, beds to make, washing to hang out. Coffee time aah! that's better, answer the telephone, put clothes into washer. Lunch to prepare for Josie,husband Keith and farm hand Ken. The afternoon sees her doing the farm accounts and paying any bills. Tea to prepare for the children coming home. Collect children from school bus, serve tea,wash up. Milking time again, put on clean filter ready for two hours milking. Almost to the end of the day, light the fire next, feed the cats and dogs, help with any last jobs outside. Supper time - usually something to cook , this over,wash up, set table for breakfast.Hurray for bed
